Reviews.Content: Bed, Breakfast, Free internet all under 9000 yen for a couple in tokyo We've found out about this hotel in the Kyoto branch. A great western style hotel for travelers on the budget. location in just about 3 minutes walk from the JR Kamata station, (which is about 6 stops from tokyo station), rooms all have internet access, breakfast is served for free including pastries, salad and drinks. all together, one of the best hotels when considering the cost.
Reviews.Author: Bergrnet
